quote: It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you. – Rumi
fact: Crocodiles and alligators are surprisingly fast on land.  Although they are rapid, they are not agile.  So, if being chased by one, run in a zigzag line to lose him or her.
joke: Why did the cookie cry? It was feeling crumby.
